scripts.test: yarn test:functions && yarn test:build && yarn test:demo
scripts.start: yarn link:components && cd demo && yarn ios
scripts.prettier: cd icons && yarn prettier && cd ../demo && yarn prettier
scripts.prettier:check: cd icons && yarn prettier:check && cd ../demo && yarn prettier:check
scripts.lint: cd icons && yarn lint && cd ../demo && yarn lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd icons && yarn lint:fix && cd ../demo && yarn lint:fix
scripts.precommit: yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn test
scripts.publish:package: cd dist && rm -f *.tgz && set npm_config_yes=true && npx -p @pxblue/publish pxb-publish
